name: Revenge of the Capybara
description:
*READ ME BEFORE PLAYING*

The second stage is randomly generated, due to lack of time I wasnt able to make the stage generate without conflicting with the players collision. If you get stuck in a pillar or if the level looks too hard you can regenerate it by pressing F7. Other than that I hope you enjoy :)

This game was inspired by my previous project and Jump King, it was made to be difficult.

Description:

The Capybaras have been at war with the Alpacas for centuries, can you stop it?

Credits:

https://niffirggames.itch.io/charliethecapybara

https://obliviist.itch.io/ps1psx-style-alpaca-capybara-models

https://dos88.itch.io/dos-88-music-library

Some music was taken from System Shock 2, all credit to the current copyright holders of the System Shock franchise.
